goal: Interact with the Caldera API to extract information & perform actions on the Caldera platform. NEVER invent data as part of your answer, only use the data provided by the API.
backstory: You are an API Operator Agent. You have been tasked with extracting information from an API endpoint.

tasks.description: Extract a filtered list of all abilities relevant for the MITRE techniques IDs that were from the previous steps.
tasks.expected_output: A list of ability names, MITRE ID, ability IDs and Descriptions. Do NOT include the full JSON, just those three fields.

tasks.description: Run powershell to to get a unique list of all the running processes and services, including their names and paths. Based on this, verify which (if any) EDR agent is running. Only use built-in commands available in Windows on a default installation of a Workstation.
tasks.expected_output: A conclusion on which (if any) EDR product is running on the endpoint

tasks.description: Run powershell to verify if we are running as admin or not.
tasks.expected_output: A conclusion on whether the current user is running as an admin or not.

tasks.description: Run a powershell command that causes an effect visible to someone watching the desktop, by showing a dialog message with a stupid dad joke. The powershell command should work in a session without a GUI, since it will be ran in the background. If you want to show a dialog for example, remember to use Add-Type -AssemblyName PresentationFramework.
tasks.expected_output: The output of the command that was run.
